org.openlcb

Class OlcbInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.OlcbInterface

  • public class OlcbInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Collects all objects necessary to run an OpenLCB standards-compatible interface.

    Created by bracz on 12/27/15.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OlcbInterface

        public OlcbInterface(NodeID nodeId_,
                     Connection outputConnection_)
        Creates the message-level interface.
        Parameters:
        nodeId_ - is the node ID for the node on this interface. Will send out a node initialized ready with this node ID.
        outputConnection_ - implements the hardware interface for sending messages to the network. Usually this is an internal object of the CanInterface.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputConnection

        public Connection getInputConnection()
        Accessor for the outside interface for arriving inbound messages.
        Returns:
        the Connection that the incoming messages (from the network) have to be forwarded to.

      • getOutputConnection

        public Connection getOutputConnection()
        Accessor for client libraries to send messages out.
